channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - May 1, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-may-1-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We've got sessions of great games like *Apocalypse World: Burned Over* hacked for *Star Wars*, *Take My Revolution*, *Eotenweard*, and more! Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
